https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/t3mCwk6TY9C56wRggtQGNxGfVKb.jpg Kyle and Jen, estranged siblings, travel from New York City to rural Pennsylvania to pack up the home of their recently deceased mother. While there, they make a discovery that turns their world upside-down. A Picture of You is a serious movie about life that gets sideswiped in the supermarket parking lot by a funny movie about death. Itâ€™s a story about family, loss, secrets, letting go, and starting anew. A Picture of You
